parameters.name: TextX
parameters.description: X text location in meters (see Remarks )

parameters.name: TextY
parameters.description: Y text location in meters (see Remarks )

parameters.name: TextZ
parameters.description: Z text location in meters (see Remarks )

parameters.name: TextAngle
parameters.description: Text angle for rotated text in radians

title: IDrawingDoc.ICreateText2
description: Creates a note containing the specified text at a given location.
signature:
Note ICreateText2( 
   System.String
TextString
,
   System.Double
TextX
,
   System.Double
TextY
,
   System.Double
TextZ
,
   System.Double
TextHeight
,
   System.Double
TextAngle
)

parameters.name: TextX
parameters.description: X text location in meters (see Remarks )

parameters.name: TextY
parameters.description: Y text location in meters (see Remarks )

parameters.name: TextZ
parameters.description: Z text location in meters (see Remarks )

parameters.name: TextAngle
parameters.description: Text angle for rotated text in radians

remarks: The location specifies the position of the upper-left corner of the box containing the text with respect to the lower-left corner of the drawing.
